colorDescription: Preview an image of a colour using its hex or rgb code.
colorNotFound: {{ERROR}} I couldn't parse `{{color}}` to a valid colour.
colorOptionColor: The colour you want to preview, in hex or rgb format.
setcolorDescription: Set the colour of a role in the server.
setcolorError: {{ERROR}} I couldn't set the colour of **{{role}}**.
setcolorNoPerms: {{ERROR}} I couldn't set the colour of **{{role}}**, make sure my highest role is above it.
setcolorNoPerms_mine: {{ERROR}} I couldn't set the colour of **{{role}}**, I am unable to set the colour of my own role.
setcolorOptionColor: The colour you want to set, in hex or rgb format.
setcolorOptionReason: The reason for setting the colour that will be displayed in the audit logs.
setcolorOptionRole: The role you want to set the colour of.
setcolorSuccess: Alrighty, I set the colour of **{{role}}** to `{{color}}`.
